Description: Rim, wall and handle sherd of East Greek (North Ionian?) pottery bowl; gritty orange clay with white inclusions; interior glazed (worn, with traces of added white bands); exterior, white slip;small part of handle floral and of object below handle roots preserved; filling ornament of dot rosettes.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.267)
